required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Longitudinal, Observational Biomarker Study in Pancreatic Cancer Patients Receiving Chemotherapy
clinical_study.official_title: A Longitudinal, Observational Biomarker Study in Pancreatic Cancer Patients Receiving Chemotherapy

brief_summary.textblock:
1. Based on the literature, the pancreatic cancer treatment predictor biomarker, which is used in the domestic clinical field, is actually applied to the pancreatic cancer patient cohort of the National Cancer Center.
2. To systematically prospectively identify prospective treatment response biomarkers for Pancreatic Cancer Cohort in the National Cancer Center

detailed_description.textblock:
1. Immunohistochemistry and gene test for hENT1, DCK, SMAD4, CES2, BRCA 1/2,PALB2, MMRd, MSI, Tumor Ag and etc. on Cancer sample
2. Collect data of Biomarker for pancreatic cancer
3. Compare with Big data and Cohort study in National cancer center

primary_outcome.description: The length of time from either the date of diagnosis or the start of treatment for a disease,the length of time during and after the treatment of a disease, such as cancer, that a patient lives with the disease but it does not get worse
The length of time during and after the treatment of a disease, such as cancer, that a patient lives with the disease but it does not get worse

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pathologically Confirmed Pancreatic Cancer Patients
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who do not agree with the study
